meta.title: Cigarette vs Investment Calculator
meta.description: Calculate how much you could have invested instead of smoking. Quit smoking, start investing.

step1.title: Cigarette Consumption
step1.dailyCount: How many cigarettes do you smoke per day?
step1.brand: Which brand of cigarette do you use?

step2.title: Smoking Duration
step2.question: How many years ago did you start smoking?

step3.title: Investment Instruments
step3.question: How many different investment instruments would you like to use?
step3.info: Your cigarette spending will be equally divided among the selected investments.

step4.title: Select Investment Instruments
step4.info: You can choose different investment instruments for each year.
step4.note: * Some investment data may not be available before certain years.
